description: Add Supabase persistence and polish UI for posture/scoliosis tracking app

userStories.title: Set up Supabase client and database schema
userStories.description: Create Supabase project config, define tables for photos, metrics, analysis_logs, and todos. Create migration files.

userStories.title: Persist photos to Supabase Storage
userStories.description: Upload photos to Supabase Storage bucket, save metadata to photos table. Load photos on page load.

userStories.title: Persist metrics to database
userStories.description: Save metric entries to metrics table. Load and display historical data. Sync with charts.

userStories.title: Persist analysis log entries
userStories.description: Save analysis entries (AI, personal, specialist) to analysis_logs table. Load on page load.

userStories.title: Persist todos/protocol items
userStories.description: Save todos to todos table. Track completion status. Load on page load.

userStories.title: Add loading states and error handling
userStories.description: Show loading spinners during data fetch. Handle errors gracefully with toast notifications.

userStories.title: Polish UI and mobile responsiveness
userStories.description: Improve spacing, animations, empty states. Ensure great mobile experience.

userStories.title: Add data export feature
userStories.description: Allow exporting all data as JSON for backup/portability.
